label: typeCode
comment: A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

domainIncludes.comment: A significant occurrence or happening during transport.,A referenced significant occurrence or happening during transport.

A calculation of the pollution (including noise, heat, and radiation etc.) discharged into the environment by a residential, commercial, or industrial facility or by a means of transport, such as a vessel, aircraft or truck.
Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.
Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted resulting from transportation.
An unused and rejected as unwanted component of transport material resulting from transportation.
Sanitary measures as reported for a WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health).
Information related to a specific transportation indication to be reported on a WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health).
An IOT (Internet of Things) piece of mechanical or electronic equipment which can collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data.
A stores item, such as for onboard use during a journey.
A process of either regaining substances in usable form, or of getting rid of substances resulting from transportation.
An object which can detect and measure physical properties and which can record, indicate and transmit such measurements.
The identification of related information in a supply chain context.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
Hardware or software typically marketed by a company other than the original manufacturer.
